Posts.Content: Jun 17, 2009 08:57AM fiddle wrote: I can completely identify with you.  I found a lump about 2 weeks ago and tried to ignore it as we are planning a long summer holiday.  However, I couldn't ignore it or leave it alone.  I finally (after posting on a discussion board here) went to the doctor on Monday, and I now have an ultrasound scheduled for tomorrow.  Like your doctor, my doctor did not seem too worried, but I can't stop thinking about it!!!  Good luck to you.
Posts.Title: mobile lump CherylAnn beacon800
